title: dhEvaki nandhana
sahitya:
sindu bhairavi

dEvaki nandana nanda mukunda
nandita muni jana nityaananda
(dEvaki)

anupallavi 

nidamOtaara navaneeta cOra
gagapati vaahanaa jagadOthaara
(dEvaki)

caraNam 1 bhaagEshri

makara kuNDala dara mOhana vEsha
rukmiNi vallabhaa paaNDava pOshaa
(dEvaki)

caraNam 2 valaci

shanka cakra dara shree gOvindaa
pankaja lOcanaa paramaanandaa
(dEvaki)

caraNam 3 saaranga

kamsa mardhana kowstubaabharaNaa
hamsa vaahana poojita caraNaa
(dEvaki)

caraNam 4 bhaagEshri

varada bElaa pura cenna prasannaa
purandara viTThala guNa paripoorNaa
(dEvaki)
